title: TipoType // new type foundry from latinamerica!
content:
Dear Typophiles:

Today [TipoType](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203013211/http:/www.tipotype.com/) ( [www.tipotype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20100203013211/http:/www.tipotype.com/ "www.tipotype.com")), a digital type foundry from Montevideo, Uruguay comes to light. This is the first type foundry of Uruguay, feel free to contact us.

Thank you,  
Fernando DÃ­az  
TipoType Coordinator.
author: strass

comments.content:
Quiroga Serif has a nice touch :)  
Not much competition if your the only type foundry, I dont even know what's that like, must feel good I think?  
And TipoType is a catchy name, good choice!

Rudy

Nice website and fonts, only I think the footer is a little too dark. ;)

Keep up the good work!

Kind regards,  
Martijn van Berkel
